text: Sotkamo is a municipality in the region of Kainuu, Finland. In January 2014, it had a population of over 10,650. It covers an area of . Neighbouring municipalities are Kajaani, Kuhmo, Nurmes, Paltamo, Rautavaara, Ristijärvi, Sonkajärvi and Valtimo. Hiidenportti National Park is in Sotkamo.Sotkan maa - Sotkamo, Alpo Komulainen 001 1 398 ==References== == Other websites == * The official Sotkamo page Category:Municipalities of Kainuu
title: Sotkamo
